[[Version 1.3]]
* Enduring Rock's effect was adjusted:
** {{Color|Old effect:}} Increases [[Poise|resistance to interruption]]. When protected by a [[shield]], increases Attack DMG by 15%.
** {{Color|New effect:}} Increases shield strength by 15%. Additionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characteristics: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemies will decrease their Geo RES by 20% for 15s.
----
[[Version 1.2]]
* Protective Canopy's effect was adjusted:
** {{Color|Old effect:}} Increases all Elemental RES by 15%.
** {{Color|New effect:}} All Elemental RES +15%, Physical RES +15%.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
*Elemental Resonance was released.
